objectives.name: Help a kodan retrieve their lost spear from a formidable creature in the Coursing Upland.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Hunt down the rampaging reindeer" event.
objectives.name: A report has been received about a reindeer rampaging in the Cragged Upland

objectives.hint: Complete the "Join the kodan on her hunting expedition" event.
objectives.name: Help a kodan hunter in the Cragged Upland track down a warclaw.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Join the kodan on his hunting expedition" event.
objectives.name: Help a kodan hunter in the Coursing Upland track down a reindeer.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Defeat the rotling before it razes the area" event.
objectives.name: Kill the rampaging stranger spawn in the Cragged Upland.
